page.title: 05A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: My mum wakes me up at 8 o'clock and I go into the bathroom.Then I go downstairs and have my breakfast.When I have finished I go upstairs and get dressed.When I am dressed it is quarter to nine I set off to school and when I get there I have five minutes to wait.When we go in we have the register.After the register we go into assembly.After assembly we do either Maths or English.At twenty to eleven we go out to play.At 11 a.m. we come in and do our work.At twelve we go into lunch.At 1.15 we go into music.At 2.45 we go into reading.At 3.30 we go home.When I get home I play until 6.30.Then I have my tea.After tea I watch television until 9 o'clock then I go to bed.Then in the morning it starts all over again. Nicola Houston
